Body: http://arstechnica.com/security/2015/06/new-exploit-turns-samsung-galaxy-phones-into-remote-bugging-devices/I was thinking about buying this phone along with a extetnion  at my provider because the phone would be quite cheap and it has a removable battery.Is there a way that Samsung can patch this security vault by an update?Also is there a way how i can find out if the phone my provider offers is affected by this vault?
Title: New vulnerabilietes discovered in Galaxy S5 stock keyboard update
